effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.

short_effect.black_white: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks the opposing team with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks the opposing team with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.
